title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement) 

Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic act 2024 (commencement) order 2025

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024),
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 4
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 4 

of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 March, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [89] 3
